post_title: Never mind, found one! Jimmy Collins Sweet Cap Factory 30 back
post_content:
Hey all,
I need a nice Jimmy Collins SC350 Factory 30, preferably SGC 3-4, put will take PSA 3-4. Trying to work a couple of the last front back combos in the line.

I’m willing to buy or I can trade one of the prettiest P350’s around.

Here is the pic of mine. Let me know if anyone can help.

Thanks,
Bob
